alert.note: Alert for Bell; Coryell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 7:12PM CDT until June 10 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coryell County in central Texas... Northwestern Bell County in central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Gates, or near Gatesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Killeen, Temple, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Gatesville, McGregor, Fort Cavazos, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Troy, Belton Lake, Mother Neff State Park, Fort Gates, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Oglesby, South Mountain, Ding Dong, Whitson and White Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
